/usr/bin/clang  -fPIC  -g -fno-inline -fno-strict-aliasing -Wno-unknown-attributes -Wno-unused-command-line-argument -Wno-unknown-warning-option -fPIC -fno-inline -fno-strict-aliasing -U_FORTIFY_SOURCE -lpcap -rdynamic -Wl,--no-as-needed -shared -Wl,-soname,libshadow-plugin-pcap_replay.so -o libshadow-plugin-pcap_replay.so shadow-plugin-pcap_replay.hoisted.bc -lglib-2.0 -lgthread-2.0 -lgmodule-2.0 -Wl,-rpath,::::::::::::::::::::::
